message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. As we're just getting started, I'd like to make an initial offer of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, I'm looking to get a better deal. Considering the product's value to me and your own cost, I'd like to offer $8,500. I believe this is a fair price that allows us both to walk away happy.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your desire to get a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. Considering the product's value to me and the negotiations so far, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you a price of $9,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.
